message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $250.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but $150 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $225. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $180, can you consider that?

I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your willingness to go up to $180. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $200. Let me know if that works for you.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $190, can you consider that?

I can see you're really close to making a decision, and I'm willing to make one final concession. I'm counteroffering at $220, which is my absolute lowest price. If you're interested, let me know, but if not, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your final concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $185, but that's as high as I can go. If you're willing to meet me at that price, I'll take the deal.

I've already made my final concession at $220, and I'm not willing to go any lower. However, I'm willing to meet you at $200, which is the highest price I'm willing to accept. If you're not interested, I'll have to consider other options.
